All images were created using Artificial Intelligence "Microsoft 365 Copilot".
Prompt used to generate all images style was "vector graphic, clean, no outline".

To play this game you need a group of your friends. Each player draws random cards on the screen and arranges them in the order that fits their story. Player tells everyone a made-up story inspired by the things that the cards remind of. Don\'t limit your imagination by literal representations on the cards. \nEach next player continues the story of the previous.

The app allows to select which cards can get drawn at random. Card Pacs can be turned on and off as a whole or individual cards in them. (there is a possibility this is not implemented yet)

Version: 2.xyz 
Images might be added or changed in the future.
You have not enough cards in your tail. Go to \"Card packages\" in main menu and select more packages
